pull.title: guix: remove GCC 10 workaround from NSIS
pull.body:
Fixed upstream in 3.06.
See https://github.com/kichik/nsis/commit/229b6136c41ba5caba25936f4927476d20aa283f and https://sourceforge.net/p/nsis/bugs/1248/.

Split from #27897, as that is still WIP, and GCC 12 isn't required to make this change.
This commit could have gone in with #28328.

Guix Build (same for x86_64 & aarch64):
